posts.postText:
Damage logs are highly needed, it shouldn't be on the RP name, but the regular name, to found out who is random tranqing, because its become So annoying, so many people do it, and they get away from it.

Damage logs will help us out, a lot, and will get the guards that free shoot also.
I agree, Tweekie. It would be helpful.
There's no reason why post round damagelogs shouldn't be allowed like on TTT. +support.

OOOH. kk i never knew how. what if we catch them doing random tranqs in the logs? do we post it in ban request? it will help out actually. so that we can slap the free tranqers while they are doing it, and just slap them to get rid of it. because we wont really know if it was on purpose or not. throughout the round, and we can get rid of the problem a lot easier.
